title: Wray corrects Greene at hearing: 'I’m not part of the DHS'
description: FBI Director Christopher Wray corrected Rep. title: Fulton County DA seeks to revoke bond for Trump Georgia co-defendant
description: Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis (D) is seeking to revoke the bond allowing a defendant in the Georgia racketeering case involving former President Trump to remain free ahead of trial. title: When will Social Security cost-of-living increases take effect?
description: The Social Security Administration announced 2024's cost-of-living adjustment (COLA) just over a month ago, confirming a 3.2% bump in benefits for retirees. Here's what you need to know.

title: Biden, Xi sit down in San Francisco for critical meeting
description: President Biden met face-to-face with Chinese President Xi Jinping on Wednesday in a high stakes meeting between the leaders of two global powers. title: Judge holds hearing in Trump Georgia case after leaked videos: Watch live
description: The judge overseeing former President Trump’s Georgia 2020 election subversion case will hold a hearing Wednesday afternoon after media outlets published recorded statements made by four defendants — including Trump-aligned attorneys Sidney Powell and Jenna Ellis — as part of their plea deals. Prosecutors are demanding a protective order, which would place restrictions on how defendants...

title: Biden meets with China's Xi Jinping in San Francisco: Watch live
description: President Biden is slated to meet with Chinese President Xi Jinping Wednesday afternoon in San Francisco during the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit (APEC), as The Hill reported. Biden will go into the meeting in with some key goals, including resuming direct military-to-military lines of communication as a way to lower the temperature between Washington and...

title: 500,000 people rejected from Facebook privacy settlement: How to tell if you will get paid
description: Half a million hopefuls waiting for a check from the massive $725 million Facebook privacy settlement received a rejection letter over the past week. Were you one of them? It's not too late to fix it.

title: 'Gwyneth Goes Skiing': London theater announces musical based on Paltrow trial
description: A London-based theater company will stage a new musical production centered around actress and entrepreneur Gwyneth Paltrow’s skiing accident trial. Pleasance Theatre announced on Wednesday an Awkward Productions musical, “Gwyneth Goes Skiing.” It is a satire musical based on the actress' ski course collision with a retired optometrist at a Utah resort in 2016 and...

title: Abortion rights triumph as conservatives 'reap what they Roe'
description: Don't mess with our right to choose or you'll reap sour returns at the ballot box for a generation.

title: New Hampshire to announce primary date today
description: New Hampshire Secretary of State David Scanlan (R) is set to announce the Granite State’s presidential primary on Wednesday, his office said, solidifying another piece of the presidential nominating calendar as 2024 heats up. title: Jamie Dimon called Nikki Haley about cutting federal benefit programs
description: Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley says she got a call from JP Morgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon on the national debt level and on cutting federal retirement and medical insurance programs. title: Senate Dems mark 2-year anniversary of infrastructure law: Watch live
description: Senate Democrats are scheduled to give remarks Wednesday morning regarding the two-year anniversary of President Biden signing the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law. The event is scheduled for 10:30 a.m. ET. Watch the live video above.

title: Mayorkas, Wray testify before House on threats to homeland security: Watch live
description: The House Homeland Security Committee is holding a hearing Wednesday morning titled "Worldwide Threats to the Homeland," where witnesses will testify about subjects likely to include the border, Israel, Iran, and China, according to a press release from the committee. The witnesses scheduled to testify are Department of Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas, FBI Director...

title: Most Americans in new poll say Congress shouldn't use government shutdown to bargain
description: Most Americans don’t want Congress threatening to shut down the government in order to further their goals, according to a new Marist poll, published Wednesday. After the House passed its bill to avert a government shutdown, the ball in now in the Senate's court. It appears likely that the government will not run out of...

title: The true price of Hamas's hostage endgame
description: With Hamas not executing the hostages — at least not yet — Israel is likely proceeding very carefully as it gathers intelligence and considers different options.

title: Goodbye, snowy winters? New climate report offers dry projections
description: A new federal climate report shows snowpacks across the U.S. could take a hit as temperatures rise.

title: Morning Report — Senate up next to avert shutdown; Biden meets Xi
description: We’re focused today on tentative budgetary sighs of relief in Washington and a San Francisco meeting between President Biden and President Xi Jinping of China.  First up, the Senate. title: Cost of a Thanksgiving meal drops, but it's still expensive in these areas
description: While the cost is down from last year's record high, you'll still be facing some hefty prices, a new report shows.

title: Zelle banks are reimbursing victims of imposter scams
description: Banks that use Zelle are refunding money to customers who were the victims of imposter scams carried out using the peer-to-peer network – here's what we know so far.

title: Judge rules Trump can stay on Michigan ballot, rejects insurrection clause challenge
description: A Michigan judge ruled former President Trump can remain on the state’s 2024 presidential primary ballot, rejecting an attempt to remove him with a Civil War-era Constitutional clause. Michigan Court of Claims Judge James Redford rejected arguments made by activist groups that claimed Trump’s role in the Jan. 6, 2021, riot on the U.S. Capitol...

title: Senate blocks House bill to help Israel, cut IRS
description: The Senate voted along party lines Tuesday to table a motion to proceed to the House-passed bill to provide $14.3 billion in emergency aid to Israel and pay for it by cutting the Internal Revenue Service’s budget.   The vote came after a group of Senate conservatives ambushed Democrats by offering a surprise motion to...
